price: Ey qövmüm! Bu dünya həyatı fani bir zövqdür, axirət isə əbədi qərar tutulacaq yurddur.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi innamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā matāʿun wa-inna al-ākhirata hiya dāru al-qarāri
